rules_text:
Whenever a creature dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
At the beginning of your end step, put a decay counter on Arcet. It deals X damage to each player, planeswalker, and other creature, where X is the number of decay counters on it.
Escape–{4}{B}{B}{B}, Exile the top thirteen cards of your library.
notes: !append (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
